text: The northbound platform Guinardó | Hospital de Sant Pau (until 2009 Guinardó) is a station of the Barcelona Metro, on L4, serving Ronda del Guinardó and Plaça del Guinardó. It opened in 1974. The station is due to become part of double line L9-L10 in the near future. ==Services== ==See also== *List of Barcelona Metro stations ==External links== *Trenscat.com Category:Barcelona Metro line 4 stations Category:Transport in Horta-Guinardó Category:Railway stations opened in 1974 Category:1974 establishments in Spain
title: Guinardó – Hospital de Sant Pau (Barcelona Metro)
